00066 // HISTORY:
00067 //
00068 // -Feb 4, 2006 
00069 //  A CIccMpeCreator singleton class has been added to provide general
00070 //  support for dynamically creating element classes using a element signature.
00071 //  Prototype and private element type support can be added to the system
00072 //  by pushing additional IIccMpeFactory based objects to the 
00073 //  singleton CIccMpeCreator object.
00074 //
00075 // -Nov 6, 2006
00076 //  Merged into release
00077 //
00079 
00080 #ifndef _ICCMPEFACTORY_H
00081 #define _ICCMPEFACTORY_H
00082 
00083 #include "IccDefs.h"
00084 #include <memory>
00085 #include <list>
00086 
00087 //CIccProcessElement factory support
00088 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
00089 namespace sampleICC {
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 class CIccMultiProcessElement;
00093 
00104 class ICCPROFLIB_API IIccMpeFactory 
00105 {
00106 public:
00107   virtual ~IIccMpeFactory() {}
00108 
00121   virtual CIccMultiProcessElement* CreateElement(icElemTypeSignature elemTypeSig)=0;
00122 
00134   virtual bool GetElementSigName(std::string &elemName, icElemTypeSignature elemTypeSig)=0;
00135 };
00136 
00137 
00138 //A CIccMpeFactoryList is used by CIccMpeCreator to keep track of element
00139 //creation factories
00140 typedef std::list<IIccMpeFactory*> CIccMpeFactoryList;

00153 class CIccBasicMpeFactory : public IIccMpeFactory
00154 {
00155 public:
00166   virtual CIccMultiProcessElement* CreateElement(icElemTypeSignature elementSig);
00167 
00179   virtual bool GetElementSigName(std::string &elemName, icElemTypeSignature elemTypeSig);
00180 };
00181 
00182 class CIccMpeCreator;
00183 
00184 typedef std::auto_ptr<CIccMpeCreator> CIccMpeCreatorPtr;
00185 
00196 class CIccMpeCreator 
00197 {
00198 public:
00199   ~CIccMpeCreator();
00200 
00213   static CIccMultiProcessElement* CreateElement(icElemTypeSignature elemTypeSig)
00214       { return CIccMpeCreator::GetInstance()->DoCreateElement(elemTypeSig); }
00215 
00229   static bool GetElementSigName(std::string &elemName, icElemTypeSignature elemTypeSig)
00230       { return CIccMpeCreator::GetInstance()->DoGetElementSigName(elemName, elemTypeSig); }
00231 
00245   static void PushFactory(IIccMpeFactory *pFactory)
00246       { CIccMpeCreator::GetInstance()->CIccMpeCreator::DoPushFactory(pFactory); }
00247 
00262   static IIccMpeFactory* PopFactory()
00263       { return CIccMpeCreator::GetInstance()->DoPopFactory(); }
00264 
00265 private:
00267   CIccMpeCreator() { }
00268 
00280   static CIccMpeCreator* GetInstance();
00281 
00282   CIccMultiProcessElement* DoCreateElement(icElemTypeSignature elemTypeSig);
00283   bool DoGetElementSigName(std::string &elemName, icElemTypeSignature elemTypeSig);
00284   void DoPushFactory(IIccMpeFactory *pFactory);
00285   IIccMpeFactory* DoPopFactory(bool bAll=false);
00286 
00287   static CIccMpeCreatorPtr theElementCreator; 
00288 
00289   CIccMpeFactoryList factoryStack;
00290 };
